Detailed Description

Determines naively the k nearest photons around a given point.

std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<Photon> > PhotonList::get_k_nearest ( const Point3D &  point,
int  k 
) [inline]

Method to get the k nearest photon of a point.

Parameters:
point : center of the research sphere
k : number of photon to find

The list is roughly sorted by distance of photon to point and cut to the desired length k.
